name: Dig It! (itch) (Rusty Bailey, Jon Koon)
description:
There’s gold in them thar hills! You’ve just been given a hot tip about a new mine filled with potential treasure. You have a limited time to unearth the riches before other prospectors get word of the opportunity. Put on your boots because it’s time to dig!

How to play
  • Try to get the highest score with your combined total of treasure and depth
  • Use arrows or d-pad to dig (left, right, down)
Credits
  • Jon Koon - programming
  • Rusty Bailey - in-game art and sound
  • Julie Koon - cover/banner art
